芿字的基本解释

芿
réng
割后再生的新草。
乱草。

芿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rèng］
［《廣韻》而證切，去證，日。］
亦作“艿2”。
(1)割后再生的新草。
(2)乱草。

芿字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　芿； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1021第15
【唐韻】而證切【集韻】如證切，?音認。草不剪也。【列子·黃帝篇】藉芿燔林。【唐書·杜祐傳】祐于朱坡樊川，頗治亭館林芿，鑿山股泉，與賔客置酒爲樂。【方干詩】芿草不停獸。　又【集韻】如烝切，音仍。艿或作芿。詳艿註。

芿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
芿字的起名意思

指割后再生的新草。

芿
Basic explanation of words
芿
réng
New grass regenerated after mowing.
Messy grass.
芿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［rèng］
["Guangyun" and the proof cut, go to the proof, day. ]
Also known as "艿2".
(1) New grass regenerated after cutting.
(2) Chaos grass.
芿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　芿; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1021 Page 15
[Tang Yun] and Zheng Qi [Ji Yun] such as Zheng Qi,? Sound recognition. The grass is not cut either. 【Liezi·Huangdi Chapter】Borrowed by Yan Lin. [Tang Shu·Du You Biography] You Yu Zhupo Fanchuan, Pozhi Pavilion Lin Yu, chiseled mountain springs, and had fun with the swimmers. [Fang Qianshi] The grass keeps beasts.　[Jiyun] It's like cut, the sound is still there.艿 or make 艿. Note in detail.

Name meaning
Refers to the new grass regenerated after cutting.
rèng
трава, которая была срезана и отросла; дикая трава
